topics.body: So I just got back from my granddad's place. I went to check up on him and see if he's ready for snow. So I get there and Victor (His newly adopted cat) is inside. What's the first thing this cat does when I sit down? He jumps in my lap, rolls over on his back. and begs me to rub his belly. So I do. And he loves it. And he didn't tear my arm to shreds.
